Package model

Class ProjectImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ProjectImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Project
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerImplTest.MockProject, ProjectImplTest.MockProject
    public class ProjectImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Project
    Implementation of project class. Contains Layers, which each contain an Image

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter​(java.lang.String layerName,
                      java.lang.String filterOption)
        Description copied from interface: Project
        Set the filter of the given layer to a specific option. - normal : does nothing to the image - red-component: only uses the red portion of the RGB. Similar for green-component and blue-component - brighten-value: adds the brightness value pixel by pixel according to value from the corresponding pixel on the current layer . Similar for brighten-intensity and brighten-luma. Only affects the current layer. - darken-value: when applied, removes the brightness value pixel by pixel according to value from the corresponding pixel on the current layer . Similar for darken-intensity and darken-luma. Only affects the current layer.
        Specified by:
        setFilter in interface Project
        Parameters:
        layerName - the name of the Layer to apply the filter to
        filterOption - the type of filter to apply to the layer
